name: Disentropy
description:
The photon Gamma, a subatomic particle from another universe finds themselves stranded in our universe where heat death is at maximum. Join Gamma on a journey through the remains of our universe as they seek companionship, and maybe even a solution to reverse entropy.

Story content includes a lot of Quantum Physics, Cosmology,  and thermodynamics terminology.
